speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Michael from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing fine, thank you. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Could you please verify your date of birth for security purposes?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Can you also confirm your address?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thank you. I can confirm that you have a balance of $450. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of it today. Can I do that?

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, you can pay $225 today. Would you like to pay by credit card or bank transfer?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect. Can you please provide me with your card details?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. I've processed your payment of $225 successfully. You will receive a confirmation shortly.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day.
